text:
Kentik | SF | Onsite (Preferred) / Remote (Possible)

SF startup hiring frontend/backend hackers. We take network data at scale, store it and take actions based on it. JS/Go/C stack. If you want to work with data, visualize data or think SDN might have legs, get in touch.

https://www.kentik.com/careers/ pye+hn at kentik.com
